pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Modeling and Analysis of Spatially Correlated Survival Data // Provides several Bayesian survival models for spatial /non-spatial survival data: marginal Bayesian Nonparametric models, marginal Bayesian proportional hazards models, generalized accelerated failure time frailty models, and standard semiparametric frailty models within the context of proportional hazards, proportional odds and accelerated failure time.
